ruleEngine

Class RuleChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • ruleEngine.RuleChecker

  • public class RuleChecker
extends java.lang.Object
    Object acting as a hub for Game to check actions on the board. Should be instantiated once.
    See Also:
    IRule, RuleResult

        public boolean checkAction(GameState state,

      • checkAndApplyAction

        public RuleResult checkAndApplyAction(GameState gameState,
                                      GameAction action)
                               throws IncorrectGameActionException
        Check if a given action on a given stage of the game is allowed or not.
        Parameters:
        gameState - The stage of the game when the action is performed.
        action - The action to check if allowed or not.
        Returns:
        RuleResult object containing information about the validity of the performed action.
        Throws:
        IncorrectGameActionException - The action is not recognized by the RuleChecker.
